mention.text: European Commission spokeswoman Pia Ahrenkilde Hansen
broad economic sanctions against entire sectors of the Russian economy
the situation in Ukraine , including visa bans and asset
a former region of Ukraine that held a referendum in March in which 96 percent of population voted for integration with Russia
